summary: Hungary is a country in Central Europe, with a rich history. It is landlocked and surrounded by countries like Slovakia, Romania, and Austria. The capital is Budapest, and most people speak Hungarian. Before becoming a state, many groups lived there, including the Celts and Romans. The Hungarian kingdom was powerful in the 1400s and 1500s. Later, it was ruled by the Habsburgs and became part of Austria-Hungary. After World War I, Hungary lost much of its land. It joined World War II with the Axis powers and later became a Soviet Union ally. Today, Hungary is a democratic country in the European Union, known for its culture and tourism.
title: Hungary
